---
order: 6
title:
  zh-CN: 排序
  en-US: Order
---

## zh-CN

通过 Order 来改变元素的排序。

## en-US

To change the element sort by order.

```jsx
import { Row, Col } from 'antd';

ReactDOM.render(
  <Row>
    <Col span={6} order={4}>
      1 col-order-4
    </Col>
    <Col span={6} order={3}>
      2 col-order-3
    </Col>
    <Col span={6} order={2}>
      3 col-order-2
    </Col>
    <Col span={6} order={1}>
      4 col-order-1
    </Col>
  </Row>,
  mountNode,
);
```

```css
#components-grid-demo-flex-order [class~='ant-row'] {
  background: rgba(128, 128, 128, 0.08);
}
```
